au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=6m_offset_apx2p5
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(5200,300) # Drive guide to g6 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g6) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g6) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', 0) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) sics.set('beamcenterx', 97.902) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.1553)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(32.5, 100) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(32.5, 0) driveBsz(258.0)
